alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ratliff, or near Callahan, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Ratliff and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.
